title: Sum of Array Elements
description: Write a function to find the sum of all elements in an array.

title: Find Maximum Element in Array
description: Write a function to find the maximum element in an array.

title: Find Minimum Element in Array
description: Write a function to find the minimum element in an array.

title: Check if Array is Empty
description: Write a function to check if an array is empty.

title: Count Occurrences of Element in Array
description: Write a function to count the occurrences of a given element in an array.

example_cases.explanation: Array is empty, so element 5 does not occur.

title: Container with most water
description: Given an array of non-negative integers representing the heights of walls, find the maximum area of water that can be trapped between the walls.

example_cases.explanation: For the input [1, 8, 6, 2, 5, 4, 8, 3, 7], the maximum area of water is obtained between the walls at indices 1 and 8. The height difference is min(8,7) = 7, and the width is 8 - 1 = 7. So, the maximum area is 7 * 7 = 49.

For the input [4, 3, 2, 1, 4], the maximum area of water is obtained between the walls at indices 0 and 4. The height difference is min(4,4) = 4, and the width is 4 - 0 = 4. So, the maximum area is 4 * 4 = 16.

For the input [1, 2, 1], the maximum area of water is obtained between the walls at indices 0 and 2. The height difference is min(1,1) = 1, and the width is 2 - 0 = 2. So, the maximum area is 1 * 2 = 2.
